name: Pod Save Us!
description:
Brace yourself and grit your teeth!  Escape the exploding mothership in your trusty escape pod and control your pod as it enters the atmosphere in a turbulent environment.

As part of the "As Above, So Below" Epic Megajam!

This is a very rough prototype and will be one of our first submissions to a game jam as a team! Any feedback is welcomed, but for you early visitors, I urge you to try our game after the submissions are over to get the best experience that we can deliver to you folks at the end of the deadline!
